website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable, elongated dual flush toilet meant for narrow, tight bathrooms in homes or apartments.
pros: Low height design makes the toilet friendly for smaller spaces or around cabinet and counter tops
Toilet is easy to clean around the outside and inside of the bowl
cons: The toilet typically takes longer to install than a regular single flush toilet

customer_reviews.title: I think this is the perfect toilet!
customer_reviews.text: This was the third one of these I've installed in two separate houses. I think this is the perfect toilet!!
customer_reviews.author: dr.m

customer_reviews.title: Had to have seals in the water tank replaced after ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to have seals in the water tank replaced after install by certified plumber. one year later tank leaking again....
customer_reviews.author: Connor Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd purchased locally
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and size but I'm having some problems with leakage and replacement parts and help has been hard to navigate.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very efficient with clean lines. Just check location of drain as it does not butt the wall.
customer_reviews.author: MOTTY FISHMAN

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: It is very stylish and comfortable to sit on. It does save water. Great Product!!
customer_reviews.author: jose aviles

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for it
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately until you try it , you don't notice it ! Because of the shape ! It makes a mess when using ! Leave residuals of urine underneath the ring on the seat ! The problem perhaps is mostly on the shape of the ring around the seat !
customer_reviews.author: Edwad Leone

customer_reviews.title: simple, works and good value
customer_reviews.text: i highly recommend this toilet. looks great, flushes great and great price for this toilet. not as fancy as other i bought, but comfy and works great so far
customer_reviews.author: ling ling chee

customer_reviews.title: Quiet/sleek/efficient
customer_reviews.text: Quiet, good flushes, weve had it for almost 16 mos.w/o any issues,it looks like an expensive toilet as well according to house guests that see it from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: gift card

customer_reviews.title: I would have given it 5 stars if the mounting ...
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars if the mounting instructions would have been correct. The dimensions in the manual for mounting the floor pieces do not match the hardware. Luckily I checked the hardware before drilling holes in the tiled floor.
customer_reviews.author: Matthias

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with design, water savings, and flush power.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice design and quality. Have had for several years now and flushes much better then previous major brand in 150 year old Georgetown house. Only issue is seat hinge could be better otherwise zero maintenance in master bath. Love quiet flush, quiet seat close, easy clean and overall modern design. Easy to install if you take you time with marking new holes. Update: finally had to replace water valve and standard Korky silent valve was perfect fit for about ten bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Dcguy

customer_reviews.title: This is the biggest waste of money I have ever dealt with.
customer_reviews.text: The toilet is not even a year old and I’ve had to replace the insides twice already and it still leaks. My 15 year old basic toilet hasn't given me this many problems.It is the biggest waist of money ever. I want to give them 0 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Carey

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, cheap, cheap
customer_reviews.text: This is a poorly made toilet! The toilet seat has broken twice and can only be replaced with the same cheaply made seat which must be purchased for at least $75 not including bolts. Don't make the same mistake we made. Stay away from these products from Eago!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Eggert

product_meta.title: EAGO TB351 Dual Flush Eco-Friendly Ceramic Toilet, White, 1-Piece
product_meta.description:
Dual Flush. So simple yet so genius. One bottom for solid waste (1.6 gpf) and one button for liquid waste (0.8 gpf). If only saving fuel was this simple.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Dual Flush. So simple yet so genius. One bottom for solid waste (1.6 gpf) and one button for liquid waste (0.8 gpf). If only saving fuel was this simple….
feature_bullets: Dual Flush. So simple yet so genius. One bottom for solid waste (1.6 gpf) and one button for liquid waste (0.8 gpf)
Soft Closing Toilet Seat and Lid Included
Powerful and efficient 3" flushing valve. Reduces the number of problems typically associated with older ball-chain-flapper systems
Wide water surface. A large surface area keeps odors down and allows for easy cleaning
Balanced water distribution. Designed to maintain the optimal balance between an increased diameter and proper exit velocity

specifications.Warranty Description: 5 year limited warranty on all porcelain parts against fading/staining of the glaze & 1 Year on flushing mechanism & toilet seat.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars24 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
